title: 78/122/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 December 1977 amending Decisions 75/576/EEC, 76/216/EEC and 77/146/EEC (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 28 December 1977  amending Decisions 75/576/EEC, 76/216/EEC and 77/146/EEC  (Only the German text is authentic)  (78/122/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The authorization for the Federal Republic of Germany granted in Decision 75/576/EEC shall be withdrawn with effect from 31 December 1977 as far as the varieties of durum wheat are concerned.
The authorization for the Federal Republic of Germany granted in Decision 76/216/EEC shall be withdrawn with effect from 31 December 1977 as far as the varieties of durum wheat are concerned.

The period provided for in Article 15 (1) of Directive 70/457/EEC shall be extended until 31 December 1983 for the Federal Republic of Germany in respect of the varieties of durum wheat covered by Decisions 75/576/EEC, 76/216/EEC and 77/146/EEC as far as in accordance with Article 15 (2) of the said Directive the granting of an authorization is concerned.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 December 1977.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President
